TopicTitle: Land on a PartGravity Mun or asteroid in Kerbol orbit

Articles.Content:
Yes! Planet practice in 0.16

What you should do:

Use the PartGravity mod and plugin and send a mini Mun or 500m asteroid in orbit around Kerbol. Either further or nearer than Kerbin orbit.

Build a rocket with any mods you like and try to land on the mini planet. Do an EVA too!!

Scoring:

10 points - get a mini Mun or asteroid to orbit Kerbol

30 points - The orbit is inclined by at least 5Ã‚Â°

40 points - The orbit is double the distance between Kerbin and Kerbol

10 points - Build a rocket and approach within 1km of the object.

10 points - Land on the mini planet

10 points - Do an EVA

20 points - Return home

50 points - Use stock parts only for the rocket to get to the mini planet

Double your points if you could land 2 separate rockets on the mini planet and so on.

Leaderboard:

I've tried it myself but failed, see how you could fair it!
